original: @188b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @188b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra sva ra sva t'i s'a dha nam /
analyzed: badzra sva ra sva t'i s'a dha nam /
translated: Vajra Sarasvatī Sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: Vajra Sarasvatī Sādhana

original: rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Vajra Sarasvatī.

original: dpal stug ston ka'i bdud rtsi'i 'od //
analyzed: dpal stug ston ka'i bdud rtsi'i 'od //
translated: The thick splendor of autumnal nectar light,

original: ku mu da bzhin bla med gang //
analyzed: ku mu da bzhin bla med gang //
translated: Like a kumuda, unsurpassed,

original: 'gro ba'i mi shes mun zhi mdzad //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mi shes mun zhi mdzad //
translated: Pacifying the darkness of ignorance in beings,

original: rgyal gyur rdo rje dbyangs can ma //🔽de yi man nag nyer bsdus nas //
analyzed: rgyal gyur rdo rje dbyangs can ma // de yi man nag nyer bsdus nas //
translated: Victorious is Vajra Sarasvatī.🔽Here, in brief,

original: de yi sgrub thabs brjod par bya //
analyzed: de yi sgrub thabs brjod par bya //
translated: I will explain her sādhana.

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje @189a * //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje @189a * //
translated: The vajra tent of the ḍākinīs,

original: gur // kun nas bstan pa brjod par bya //
analyzed: gur // kun nas bstan pa brjod par bya //
translated: I will explain the teaching in its entirety.

original: gtsang zhing yid 'ong gnas su ni //
analyzed: gtsang zhing yid 'ong gnas su ni //
translated: In a pure and pleasing place,

original: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
analyzed: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
translated: Seated on a comfortable seat,

original: dad cing las gzhan med pa yis //
analyzed: dad cing las gzhan med pa yis //
translated: With faith and no other work,

original: rjes 'jug thun mtshams gsum du bsgom //
analyzed: rjes 'jug thun mtshams gsum du bsgom //
translated: The follower should meditate in three sessions.

original: brtse ba'i mthu yis rdzogs byang chub //
analyzed: brtse ba'i mthu yis rdzogs byang chub //
translated: By the power of compassion, complete enlightenment,

original: smon lam yongs su 'dren pa yis //
analyzed: smon lam yongs su 'dren pa yis //
translated: Drawn by the aspiration prayer,

original: rmi lam sgyu ma'i dpe bzhin du //
analyzed: rmi lam sgyu ma'i dpe bzhin du //
translated: Like the examples of dream and illusion,

original: khams gsum ma lus brtag par bya //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus brtag par bya //
translated: One should examine the three realms without exception.

original: nyi zla sa bon 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: nyi zla sa bon 'od zer gyis //
translated: The sun, moon, seed, and light rays

original: de bzhin gshegs rnams gdan drangs nas //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs rnams gdan drangs nas //
translated: invite the tathāgatas.

original: kun la phan 'dod bsam pa yis //
analyzed: kun la phan 'dod bsam pa yis //
translated: With the intention of benefiting all,

original: mchod cing sdig pa ma lus bshags //🔽de nas slar yang mi byed pa'i //
analyzed: mchod cing sdig pa ma lus bshags // de nas slar yang mi byed pa'i //
translated: one should make offerings and confess all misdeeds.🔽Then, one should undertake the vow

original: dam bca' yang ni brtsam par bya //
analyzed: dam bca' yang ni brtsam par bya //
translated: never to commit them again.

original: bsod nams la ni rjes yi rang //
analyzed: bsod nams la ni rjes yi rang //
translated: One should rejoice in merit

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsngo bar bya //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsngo bar bya //
translated: and dedicate it to perfect enlightenment.

original: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
translated: One should go for refuge to the Three Jewels

original: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed bya //🔽kun mkhyen rnams kyi bran nyid du //
analyzed: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed bya // kun mkhyen rnams kyi bran nyid du //
translated: and generate the mind of enlightenment.🔽One should definitely offer oneself

original: bdag nyid nges par dbul bar bya //🔽byams pa la sogs bsgom bya zhing //
analyzed: bdag nyid nges par dbul bar bya // byams pa la sogs bsgom bya zhing //
translated: as a servant of the omniscient ones.🔽One should cultivate love and so forth

original: zhe sdang la sogs zhi bar bya //🔽de nas 'od zer gyis gang ba'i //
analyzed: zhe sdang la sogs zhi bar bya // de nas 'od zer gyis gang ba'i //
translated: and pacify hatred and so on.🔽Then, the seed syllable, filled with light rays,

original: sa bon snying po las byung ba'i //
analyzed: sa bon snying po las byung ba'i //
translated: arises from the essence.

original: phyogs kyi sgo rnams snang bya zhing //
analyzed: phyogs kyi sgo rnams snang bya zhing //
translated: One should illuminate the directional gates

original: 'od zer dkar po rab gsal 'bar //
analyzed: 'od zer dkar po rab gsal 'bar //
translated: with blazing, bright white light rays.

original: padma zla ba'i gdan la ni //
analyzed: padma zla ba'i gdan la ni //
translated: On a lotus and moon seat,

original: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
translated: Sitting in the vajra posture.

original: phyed g-yo bung ba'i yan lag can //
analyzed: phyed g-yo bung ba'i yan lag can //
translated: Half-moving, with the limbs of a bee,

original: dpal gyi skra yis legs par brgyan //
analyzed: dpal gyi skra yis legs par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the hair of glory,

original: padma dmar por rgyas bzhin //
analyzed: padma dmar por rgyas bzhin //
translated: Like a fully blossomed red lotus.

original: dpal gyi phyag g-yas rab mdzes pa //
analyzed: dpal gyi phyag g-yas rab mdzes pa //
translated: The glorious right hand is very beautiful,🔽With various beautiful garments,

original: mdzes pa'i na bza' sna tshogs dang // dpal gyis ku ni phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i na bza' sna tshogs dang // dpal gyis ku ni phun sum tshogs //
translated: And the glory of a full kuṇḍalin.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin 'od gsal //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin 'od gsal //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is radiant.

original: phyag g-yon gyis ni chu skyes can //
analyzed: phyag g-yon gyis ni chu skyes can //
translated: The left hand holds a lotus,

original: brgyad gnyis lo lon rnam pa can //
analyzed: brgyad gnyis lo lon rnam pa can //
translated: With the appearance of a sixteen-year-old,

original: na bza' kha dog dkar po bsnams //
analyzed: na bza' kha dog dkar po bsnams //
translated: Wearing white garments.

original: zla ba'i sa bon sogs skyes pa'i //
analyzed: zla ba'i sa bon sogs skyes pa'i //
translated: Born from the seed syllable of the moon,

original: 'phags ma dbyangs can ma nyid blta //
analyzed: 'phags ma dbyangs can ma nyid blta //
translated: Behold the noble Sarasvatī herself.

original: snying gar shel kyi rnam pa can //🔽zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su son //
analyzed: snying gar shel kyi rnam pa can // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su son //
translated: In the heart, with the form of crystal,🔽Residing in the center of a moon disc,

original: zla phyed skar ma dang bcas bzhin //
analyzed: zla phyed skar ma dang bcas bzhin //
translated: Like the half-moon with stars,

original: thig le n'a das yongs su brgyan /
analyzed: thig le n'a das yongs su brgyan /
translated: Adorned with the nāda of the bindu.

original: 'od zer kun nas 'phro ba can //
analyzed: 'od zer kun nas 'phro ba can //
translated: Emitting light rays in all directions,

original: dpal gyi sgra yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: dpal gyi sgra yis rnam par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the sound of glory,

original: ngag gi rnam pa kun tshogs pa'i //
analyzed: ngag gi rnam pa kun tshogs pa'i //
translated: The assembly of all aspects of speech,

original: aam yig sa bon rnam par 'dzin //🔽dza:yig la sogs sngags rnams kyis //
analyzed: aam yig sa bon rnam par 'dzin // dza:yig la sogs sngags rnams kyis //
translated: The seed syllable AṂ is held.🔽With the mantras beginning with JAH,

original: dgug pa la sogs rab sgrub thabs //
analyzed: dgug pa la sogs rab sgrub thabs //
translated: the means of accomplishment of summoning and so forth are performed.

original: rang lus rang gi lhag lha'i sku //
analyzed: rang lus rang gi lhag lha'i sku //
translated: One’s body is the body of one’s chosen deity,

original: dbyer med rab @189b sgrub de rjes su //🔽'di ni gzhug par nges pa yi //
analyzed: dbyer med rab @189b sgrub de rjes su // 'di ni gzhug par nges pa yi //
translated: inseparable, accomplished.🔽After that, the body of the victors

original: rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni 'jug / sngags pas sa bon las byung ba'i //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni 'jug / sngags pas sa bon las byung ba'i //
translated: is definitely entered by the mantrin.

original: de nyid sbyor bas nyin mtshan du //
analyzed: de nyid sbyor bas nyin mtshan du //
translated: Through the yoga of that, day and night,

original: zla ba drug tu goms pa yis //
analyzed: zla ba drug tu goms pa yis //
translated: for six months, one becomes familiar.

original: lhag pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: lhag pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur //
translated: One attains higher insight.

original: mtshan mo bdun du mngon sbyor bas //
analyzed: mtshan mo bdun du mngon sbyor bas //
translated: Through the practice for seven nights,

original: bstan bcos kun la mkhas par 'gyur //
analyzed: bstan bcos kun la mkhas par 'gyur //
translated: one becomes learned in all the treatises.

original: bsam gtan ldan pas ngal gyur na //
analyzed: bsam gtan ldan pas ngal gyur na //
translated: When one who possesses concentration becomes tired,

original: blo gzhan min pas bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: blo gzhan min pas bzlas pa bya //
translated: one recites with an undistracted mind.

original: lte bar zla ba'i sa bon nas //
analyzed: lte bar zla ba'i sa bon nas //
translated: From the seed syllable of the moon at the navel,

original: yi ge rnams kyi 'phro 'du las //
analyzed: yi ge rnams kyi 'phro 'du las //
translated: the emanation and reabsorption of the syllables🔽is performed from the mouth, above and below,

original: kha nas gong dang de nas 'og / de nas steng du rim pa yis //
analyzed: kha nas gong dang de nas 'og / de nas steng du rim pa yis //
translated: in stages.

original: mu tig rin chen bgrang phreng gis //
analyzed: mu tig rin chen bgrang phreng gis //
translated: With a rosary of precious pearls,

original: mtshungs par kun nas snang ba las //
analyzed: mtshungs par kun nas snang ba las //
translated: The same in all appearances,🔽the yogis and yoginis

original: gong nas gong du 'jug rnams kyis //
analyzed: gong nas gong du 'jug rnams kyis //
translated: should enter into the higher and higher.

original: dbyangs dang nang dang phyi rnams su //
analyzed: dbyangs dang nang dang phyi rnams su //
translated: In the inner and outer sounds and lights,🔽the yogis and yoginis

original: 'khor zhing sngags kyi phreng ba rnams //
analyzed: 'khor zhing sngags kyi phreng ba rnams //
translated: should visualize the mantra garland

original: dus mtshungs nyid la dmigs par bya //
analyzed: dus mtshungs nyid la dmigs par bya //
translated: in the same moment.

original: bam yig las skyes mtshan nyid 'di //
analyzed: bam yig las skyes mtshan nyid 'di //
translated: This characteristic born from the syllable vam

original: sa bon dang po la gzhug bya //
analyzed: sa bon dang po la gzhug bya //
translated: should be placed in the first seed.

original: lte ba'i dbus kyis bon gyi //
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus kyis bon gyi //
translated: The seed in the center of the navel

original: grub pa de bzhin nyer bar dbul //
analyzed: grub pa de bzhin nyer bar dbul //
translated: is accomplished in the same way.

original: de bzhin ting 'dzin la dmigs nas /
analyzed: de bzhin ting 'dzin la dmigs nas /
translated: Likewise, visualizing the samadhi,

original: mtshan nyid rgyun ma chad par bzla //
analyzed: mtshan nyid rgyun ma chad par bzla //
translated: recite the mantra without interruption.

original: kun nas 'khor zhing slar yang ni //
analyzed: kun nas 'khor zhing slar yang ni //
translated: Circling all around,

original: brtul zhugs ma nyams mtshan nyid gsal //
analyzed: brtul zhugs ma nyams mtshan nyid gsal //
translated: the characteristics of the undiminished conduct are clear.

original: bklags pa tsam gyis de 'bras bu //
analyzed: bklags pa tsam gyis de 'bras bu //
translated: Merely by reciting, that result

original: gzhug ni brgya rnams 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhug ni brgya rnams 'dzin par 'gyur //
translated: will be attained within a hundred days.

original: gang zhig 'dod na nyin re bzhin //
analyzed: gang zhig 'dod na nyin re bzhin //
translated: If one wishes, one can compose

original: shlo ka ni brgya rnams rtsom //
analyzed: shlo ka ni brgya rnams rtsom //
translated: a hundred slokas every day.🔽Practicing celibacy and abandoning meat,

original: tshangs par spyod cing sha dag dang // chang la sogs pa rnam par spang //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod cing sha dag dang // chang la sogs pa rnam par spang //
translated: alcohol, and so forth,

original: nyin re bzhin du khrus bya zhing //
analyzed: nyin re bzhin du khrus bya zhing //
translated: One should bathe every day,

original: cho ga 'di bzhin nyer bsten pas //
analyzed: cho ga 'di bzhin nyer bsten pas //
translated: and follow this ritual.

original: gos ni lan gsum bgo bya zhing //
analyzed: gos ni lan gsum bgo bya zhing //
translated: One should wear clothes three times,

original: dus min kha zas spang bar bya //
analyzed: dus min kha zas spang bar bya //
translated: and avoid untimely food.

original: chu rnams kyang ni so sor brtag / cho ga 'di yang 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: chu rnams kyang ni so sor brtag / cho ga 'di yang 'dod pa ste //
translated: One should also examine the waters, and this ritual is desired.

original: tshangs par spyod pa srung byed na //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa srung byed na //
translated: If one protects celibacy,

original: gzhan pa rnams ni ma bsrungs kyang //
analyzed: gzhan pa rnams ni ma bsrungs kyang //
translated: even if the others are not protected,

original: 'bras bu la dmigs myur min las //
analyzed: 'bras bu la dmigs myur min las //
translated: one will not quickly attain the result,

original: 'on kyang gtan med ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gtan med ma yin no //
translated: but it is not completely non-existent.

original: tshangs par spyod pa bskyang bya zhing //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa bskyang bya zhing //
translated: One should maintain celibacy,

original: myos byed spyod pa spang bar bya //
analyzed: myos byed spyod pa spang bar bya //
translated: and avoid intoxicating conduct.🔽One should firmly establish the result

original: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa dag / mtshungs par 'bras bu brtan par bya //🔽de las 'bras bu brgyad min pa'i //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa dag / mtshungs par 'bras bu brtan par bya // de las 'bras bu brgyad min pa'i //
translated: in accordance with the forward and reverse sequences.🔽From that, one should commence

original: yongs rdzogs cho ga brtsam par bya //
analyzed: yongs rdzogs cho ga brtsam par bya //
translated: the complete ritual, not the eight results.🔽In this, one will attain

original: khams gsum ngo mtshar nus pa yi //🔽'di la rab tu rgyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: khams gsum ngo mtshar nus pa yi // 'di la rab tu rgyas par 'gyur //
translated: the power of the three realms.

original: chu skyes stan ni mtho ba la //
analyzed: chu skyes stan ni mtho ba la //
translated: On the high seat of the lotus,

original: kha dog rnams ni dkar bar 'dod //
analyzed: kha dog rnams ni dkar bar 'dod //
translated: one should desire the white colors.

original: @190a * // bya rog mi grag shes pa yis //
analyzed: @190a * // bya rog mi grag shes pa yis //
translated: The crow does not caw, the wise one knows.🔽The wise one obtains the subsequent consecration.

original: mkhas pas rjes su gnad pa 'thob //
analyzed: mkhas pas rjes su gnad pa 'thob //
translated: The one who knows the accomplishment,🔽whether it is connected or not connected,

original: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa'am //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa'am //
translated: whether it is seen or not seen,🔽whether it is heard or not heard,🔽whether it is smelled or not smelled,🔽whether it is tasted or not tasted,🔽whether it is touched or not touched,🔽whether it is thought or not thought,🔽whether it is spoken or not spoken,🔽whether it is done or not done,🔽whether it is obtained or not obtained,🔽whether it is seen in a dream or not seen in a dream,🔽whether it is heard or not heard,🔽whether it is smelled or not smelled,🔽whether it is tasted or not tasted,

original: ji lta ji ltar dngos grub rig / mar me mthong bas rmi lam du //
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar dngos grub rig / mar me mthong bas rmi lam du //
translated: whether it is touched or not touched,🔽whether it is thought or not thought,🔽whether it is spoken or not spoken,🔽whether it is done or not done,

original: ldan pa'am ni mi ldan yang //
analyzed: ldan pa'am ni mi ldan yang //
translated: whether it is obtained or not obtained,🔽whether it is seen in a dream or not seen in a dream,🔽whether it is heard or not heard,🔽whether it is smelled or not smelled,

original: bya rol sgra ni mi grag par //
analyzed: bya rol sgra ni mi grag par //
translated: whether it is tasted or not tasted,

original: rtsa ba mo khor gang la ni //
analyzed: rtsa ba mo khor gang la ni //
translated: whether it is touched or not touched,🔽whether it is thought or not thought,🔽whether it is spoken or not spoken,🔽whether it is done or not done,🔽whether it is obtained or not obtained,

original: rang gi sngags kyis mngon par bsngags //
analyzed: rang gi sngags kyis mngon par bsngags //
translated: whether it is seen in a dream or not seen in a dream,🔽whether it is heard or not heard,🔽whether it is smelled or not smelled,

original: kham phor phyed phyed btung bar bya //
analyzed: kham phor phyed phyed btung bar bya //
translated: whether it is tasted or not tasted,🔽whether it is touched or not touched,🔽whether it is thought or not thought,🔽whether it is spoken or not spoken,🔽whether it is done or not done,🔽whether it is obtained or not obtained,

original: rang gis blangs dang rang nyid kyis //
analyzed: rang gis blangs dang rang nyid kyis //
translated: whether it is seen in a dream or not seen in a dream,🔽whether it is heard or not heard,🔽whether it is smelled or not smelled,🔽whether it is tasted or not tasted,🔽whether it is touched or not touched,🔽whether it is thought or not thought,

original: brda byas min pa gzhan stobs pa //🔽mkhas pas mi blangs cho ga yis //
analyzed: brda byas min pa gzhan stobs pa // mkhas pas mi blangs cho ga yis //
translated: whether it is spoken or not spoken,🔽whether it is done or not done,

original: blangs pa nyid na ma yin nges //🔽di ni dang por shes rab grub par bde bar gshegs rnams kyis //
analyzed: blangs pa nyid na ma yin nges // di ni dang por shes rab grub par bde bar gshegs rnams kyis //
translated: whether it is obtained or not obtained,🔽whether it is seen in a dream or not seen in a dream,

original: man ngag nyer bstan gang las rgya chen shin tu mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: man ngag nyer bstan gang las rgya chen shin tu mkhas pa ste //
translated: whether it is heard or not heard,🔽whether it is smelled or not smelled,

original: de yis myur du ngo mtshar shin tu bla na med du byed //
analyzed: de yis myur du ngo mtshar shin tu bla na med du byed //
translated: whether it is tasted or not tasted,🔽whether it

original: skye bo 'dis ni thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs go 'phang thob //
analyzed: skye bo 'dis ni thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs go 'phang thob //
translated: This person has attained the state of omniscience and so forth.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang zhabs kyi chu skyes las //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang zhabs kyi chu skyes las //
translated: From the lotus feet of the noble Avalokiteśvara,

original: 'dud pas sdig pa dag 'gyur mkhas pa'i blo gros kyi //
analyzed: 'dud pas sdig pa dag 'gyur mkhas pa'i blo gros kyi //
translated: By bowing, sins are purified, and the wise attain

original: tshul lugs rgya cher rab tu grags pa thob gyur pa'i //
analyzed: tshul lugs rgya cher rab tu grags pa thob gyur pa'i //
translated: The vast fame of the system.

original: dge slong yid kyi shing rta bskyod pas 'di brtsams so //
analyzed: dge slong yid kyi shing rta bskyod pas 'di brtsams so //
translated: The monk Manicūḍa, having attained this, composed this.

original: dang po 'khor lo 'dzin pa de nas pi tsu zung ldan pradzny'a dang ldan wardha ni //
analyzed: dang po 'khor lo 'dzin pa de nas pi tsu zung ldan pradzny'a dang ldan wardha ni //
translated: First, Cakradhara, then the pair of Picus, with Prajñā and Vardhinī,

original: de nas 'bar ba zung ldan de yi pha rol me dha phyi nas wardha ni dang phyis //
analyzed: de nas 'bar ba zung ldan de yi pha rol me dha phyi nas wardha ni dang phyis //
translated: Then the pair of Jvalana, beyond that, Medha, then Vardhinī,

original: dhi ri gnyis ldan de bzhin bu dhi wardha ni dang sv'a h'a zhes pa'i mtha' can rnams //
analyzed: dhi ri gnyis ldan de bzhin bu dhi wardha ni dang sv'a h'a zhes pa'i mtha' can rnams //
translated: Then the pair of Dhī, likewise, Budhivardhinī, ending with Svāhā.

original: mkhas sogs gyur pa rnams kyis bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis gsang sngags de 'dir legs par gsungs //
analyzed: mkhas sogs gyur pa rnams kyis bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis gsang sngags de 'dir legs par gsungs //
translated: The Sugatas have well proclaimed these mantras here for the wise and so forth.

original: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Vajra Sarasvatī is complete.
